descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Background:[/size]
[size=3]Centuries ago, the ancient warlord Freyr Gunnar was defeated and sealed deep in a tomb to be forgotten forever. Recently, the people of the Rift have re-discovered the tomb and began noticing strange activity around the tomb. The Jarl of Riften has requested the Dragonborn's assistance in permanently defeating this undead tyrant and restoring order to the Rift.
[/size]
[center][youtube]ufMt1nzDH3s[/youtube][/center][size=4]Location:[/size]
[size=3]Gunnar Tomb can be found south-east of Riften as seen on the map below.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/LTFupH2.jpg[/img][/center][/size][center][size=4]Credits:[/size][/center][center][size=3]Lautasantenni-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10123/?]Daedric Mask[/url][/size][/center]

[center][url=http://whateverdevelopment.com/][img]https://googledrive.com/host/0BzXa6dHAI--nalhZNVNGWnJ1eXc/whatever_development_transparent.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: Whatever Development
